languages.text: When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

traits.locale_text: Upon getting attacked in range, this creature dodges and moves to a free cell next to it. a Each use consumes 1 stack.

When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} it and moves to a random adjacent free cell.

When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} it and moves to a random adjacent free cell.

When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
При входящей рендж-атаке уклоняется путем перехода на соседнюю клетку. Каждый переход расходует 1 стак.

languages.text: Став целью дистанционной атаки, этот культист смерти тратит 1 уровень {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}скользящего пируэта{/g}, чтобы {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от атаки, переместившись на свободную соседнюю клетку, выбранную случайным образом.
languages.original_text: When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

traits.locale_text: Став целью дистанционной атаки, этот культист смерти тратит 1 уровень {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}скользящего пируэта{/g}, чтобы {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от атаки, переместившись на свободную соседнюю клетку, выбранную случайным образом.

Став целью дистанционной атаки, этот культист смерти тратит 1 уровень {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}скользящего пируэта{/g}, чтобы {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от атаки, переместившись на свободную соседнюю клетку, выбранную случайным образом.

languages.text: Cuando sea el objetivo de un ataque a distancia, el cultista de la muerte gasta 1 acumulación de {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}pirueta evasiva{/g} para {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} el ataque y moverse a una casilla adyacente aleatoria que esté desocupada.
languages.original_text: When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

traits.locale_text: Cuando sea el objetivo de un ataque a distancia, el cultista de la muerte gasta 1 acumulación de {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}pirueta evasiva{/g} para {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} el ataque y moverse a una casilla adyacente aleatoria que esté desocupada.

languages.text: 範囲攻撃を受けた場合、この死のカルト民は{g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}回避ピルエット{/g}を1スタック消費して攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}かわし{/g}、隣接するランダムなフリーのマスに移動する。
languages.original_text: When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

traits.locale_text: 範囲攻撃を受けた場合、この死のカルト民は{g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}回避ピルエット{/g}を1スタック消費して攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}かわし{/g}、隣接するランダムなフリーのマスに移動する。

languages.text: 当受到远程攻击时，这位拜死教教徒会消耗1层{g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}闪避舞踏{/g}层数，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}此次攻击，并随机移动到邻近的空格子处。
languages.original_text: When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

traits.locale_text: 当受到远程攻击时，这位拜死教教徒会消耗1层{g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}闪避舞踏{/g}层数，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}此次攻击，并随机移动到邻近的空格子处。

languages.text: Wird er mit einem Fernkampfangriff anvisiert, investiert dieser Todeskultist 1 Stapel {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}Ausweichpirouette{/g}, um dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g} und sich auf eine zufällige angrenzende freie Zelle zu bewegen.
languages.original_text: When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

traits.locale_text: Wird er mit einem Fernkampfangriff anvisiert, investiert dieser Todeskultist 1 Stapel {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}Ausweichpirouette{/g}, um dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g} und sich auf eine zufällige angrenzende freie Zelle zu bewegen.

languages.text: Lorsqu'il est ciblé par une attaque à distance, ce cultiste de la mort consomme 1 cumul de {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}Pirouette d'esquive{/g} pour {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} et se déplacer sur une case adjacente aléatoire.
languages.original_text: When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'il est ciblé par une attaque à distance, ce cultiste de la mort consomme 1 cumul de {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}Pirouette d'esquive{/g} pour {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} et se déplacer sur une case adjacente aléatoire.

Lorsqu'il est ciblé par une attaque à distance, ce cultiste de la mort consomme 1 cumul de {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}Pirouette d'esquive{/g} pour {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} et se déplacer sur une case adjacente aléatoire.

languages.text: Bu ölüm tarikatçısı, menzilli bir saldırının hedefi olduğunda 1 {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}kaçamaklı pirüet{/g} birikimi harcayarak saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g} ve rastgele bitişikteki boş hücrelerden birine hareket eder.
languages.original_text: When targeted with a ranged attack, this death cultist spends 1 stack of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodging{/g} the attack and moving to a random adjacent free cell.
